auth.audit_log_entries.name: audit_log_entries
auth.audit_log_entries.comment: Auth: Audit trail for user actions.

auth.identities.name: identities
auth.identities.comment: Auth: Stores identities associated to a user.

columns.name: email
columns.comment: Auth: Email is a generated column that references the optional email property in the identity_data

auth.instances.name: instances
auth.instances.comment: Auth: Manages users across multiple sites.

auth.mfa_amr_claims.name: mfa_amr_claims
auth.mfa_amr_claims.comment: auth: stores authenticator method reference claims for multi factor authentication

auth.mfa_challenges.name: mfa_challenges
auth.mfa_challenges.comment: auth: stores metadata about challenge requests made

columns.name: last_webauthn_challenge_data
columns.comment: Stores the latest WebAuthn challenge data including attestation/assertion for customer verification

auth.oauth_client_states.name: oauth_client_states
auth.oauth_client_states.comment: Stores OAuth states for third-party provider authentication flows where Supabase acts as the OAuth client.

auth.refresh_tokens.name: refresh_tokens
auth.refresh_tokens.comment: Auth: Store of tokens used to refresh JWT tokens once they expire.

auth.saml_providers.name: saml_providers
auth.saml_providers.comment: Auth: Manages SAML Identity Provider connections.

auth.saml_relay_states.name: saml_relay_states
auth.saml_relay_states.comment: Auth: Contains SAML Relay State information for each Service Provider initiated login.

auth.schema_migrations.name: schema_migrations
auth.schema_migrations.comment: Auth: Manages updates to the auth system.

auth.sessions.name: sessions
auth.sessions.comment: Auth: Stores session data associated to a user.

columns.name: not_after
columns.comment: Auth: Not after is a nullable column that contains a timestamp after which the session should be regarded as expired.

columns.name: refresh_token_hmac_key
columns.comment: Holds a HMAC-SHA256 key used to sign refresh tokens for this session.

columns.name: refresh_token_counter
columns.comment: Holds the ID (counter) of the last issued refresh token.

auth.sso_domains.name: sso_domains
auth.sso_domains.comment: Auth: Manages SSO email address domain mapping to an SSO Identity Provider.

auth.sso_providers.name: sso_providers
auth.sso_providers.comment: Auth: Manages SSO identity provider information; see saml_providers for SAML.

columns.name: resource_id
columns.comment: Auth: Uniquely identifies a SSO provider according to a user-chosen resource ID (case insensitive), useful in infrastructure as code.

auth.users.name: users
auth.users.comment: Auth: Stores user login data within a secure schema.

columns.name: is_sso_user
columns.comment: Auth: Set this column to true when the account comes from SSO. These accounts can have duplicate emails.

columns.name: owner
columns.comment: Field is deprecated, use owner_id instead

columns.name: owner
columns.comment: Field is deprecated, use owner_id instead

vault.secrets.name: secrets
vault.secrets.comment: Table with encrypted `secret` column for storing sensitive information on disk.
